WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thank you for your feedback. We will probably not be updating the look in the toolkit for the short-term, but will incorporate this feedback when we revisit the look of our controls.
WorkItem.Description: I think the WPF Grid will look a lot better out of the box if you change the default VerticalGridLinesBrush and HorizontalGridLinesBrush from black to a lighter gray. That way it is easier to focus on the real content of the grid.
WorkItem.Summary: Change Default GridLinesBrush from Black to LightGray
